genius.core.parties

Interface Mediator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NegotiationParty, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeedbackMediator, FixedOrderFlippingMediator, MediatorHumanNegotiationParty, RandomFlippingMediator, SmartMediatorOnlyFeedback

    public interface Mediator
extends NegotiationParty
    Base class for all mediator parties. A mediator is running on a protocol that supports mediators, such as the SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol.
    Author:
    David Festen, W.Pasman

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface genius.core.parties.NegotiationParty

        chooseAction, getDescription, getProtocol, init, negotiationEnded, receiveMessage
